-Lunarpineres my name. You mentioned others? Maximals? Lunarpine 
doesn't trust his new friend but his instincts say to follow. Having 
been alone for so long he feels it's worth the risk. "lead on Shadow 
Wing.
-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> "Yes I spoke." She said with a smile that only an owl can make.
> "I happen to be a Maximal.  Like the symbol on your shoulder shows, 
your 
> like me, a Maximal. If you wish, I can take you to our base and you 
can 
> speak with the other there.  I Welcome you to join us."
> She flew down and stood eight next to him.
> "Oh, by the way, I'm Shadow Wing.  What's your name?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ---------------Original Message------------
> >From: cyberwolf4@p...

> >-You spoke? (smells the air) You have a familiar scent, you're like
> >me. what are you?
> >
> >
> >  In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > >
> > > She was flying around enjoying the night sky.  She liked the
> >evening time
> > > and enjoyed flying at night.  With her owl mode, it yearned to 
fly
> >at night.
> > >   She spotted movement in the trees and used ehr telescopic
> >vision.  She saw
> > > what looked like a wolf.  She flew downward and landed on a 
brach
> >above the
> > > creature.
> > > "Hello and how are you on this fine night? You look lost, need 
help
> >in
> > > finding your way?"
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > ------Original Message-------------
> > > >From: cyberwolf4@p...
> > > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > >Subject: The great North
> > >
> > > >Lunarpine stares at the stars above in the moonlit sky. Deep 
down
> >he
> > > >knows that they're not his. He knows of the emblem on his right
> > > >shoulder but knows not the meaning. As a robot he knows that he
> >does
> > > >not belong on this peaceful plane. As a wolf he yearns for
> > > >companionship, for the hunt. Here he sits, a lone wolf in 
search
> >of a
> > > >pack. A lost beast willing to sell his spark for some answers.
> > > >
> > >
